verse.name: c1a
c1b
verse.lines:
Onward, forward,
shout aloud Hosanna!
Christ is Captain of the mighty throng

verse.name: v1a
v1b
v2a
verse.lines:
Strong to meet the foe,
Marching on we go,
While our cause we know,
Must prevail;

verse.name: v2b
v3a
v3b
verse.lines:
When the battle’s done,
And the vict'ry's won,
May we wear the crown
Before Thy face.
